name: turbofan-opt-deopt-demo
description: Demonstration of V8 TurboFan optimization and deoptimization in TypeScript

scripts.all: npm run opt && npm run deopt && npm run monomorphic && npm run polymorphic
scripts.deopt-explorer:opt: npm run build && node --trace-opt --trace-deopt --log-code --log-maps --log-internal-timer-events --prof dist/examples/optimization.js > logs/opt-trace.log 2>&1
scripts.deopt-explorer:deopt: npm run build && node --trace-opt --trace-deopt --log-code --log-maps --log-internal-timer-events --prof dist/examples/deoptimization.js > logs/deopt-trace.log 2>&1
scripts.deopt-explorer:hidden: npm run build && node --trace-opt --trace-deopt --log-code --log-maps dist/examples/hidden-class.js > logs/hidden-class-trace.log 2>&1
scripts.deopt-explorer:inline: npm run build && node --trace-opt --trace-deopt --log-code --log-maps dist/examples/inline-cache.js > logs/inline-cache-trace.log 2>&1
scripts.deopt-explorer:poly: npm run build && node --trace-opt --trace-deopt --log-code --log-maps dist/examples/polymorphic.js > logs/polymorphic-trace.log 2>&1
